wishes.title: Polaroid Camera
wishes.description: A classic instant-film camera that prints photos on the spot — perfect for capturing fun memories.

wishes.title: Hand-Illustrated Mug
wishes.description: A beautifully designed ceramic mug with floral illustration — adds aesthetic charm to her morning coffee or tea.

wishes.title: Marshall Headphones
wishes.description: Stylish on-ear wireless headphones by Marshall with great sound quality and long battery life.

wishes.title: Necklace
wishes.description: A radiant 14K gold pendant with a golden citrine gem symbolizing joy, energy, and self-discovery.

wishes.title: Leather Journal
wishes.description: Handcrafted genuine leather journal with lined pages — perfect for writing thoughts, dreams, and memories.

wishes.title: Aromatherapy Diffuser
wishes.description: Ultrasonic essential oil diffuser with LED color-changing lights — creates a relaxing atmosphere at home.

wishes.title: MacBook Pro
wishes.description: Powerful 14-inch MacBook Pro with M3 chip — ideal for professional work, creative projects, and daily productivity.

wishes.title: Artisan Coffee Beans
wishes.description: Premium specialty coffee beans from Ethiopia — aromatic, smooth, and perfectly roasted for the ultimate coffee experience.
